model.from sentence: The model is implemented using Python and Tensorflow .

biases.from sentence: All the weights of the model are initialized by Glorot Initialization and biases are initialized with zeros .

All the words.from sentence: All the words that do not appear in Glove are initialized by sampling from a uniform random distribution between .

number of hidden units.from sentence: The number of hidden units are set to 100 .

300 dimensional word vectors.from sentence: We use a 300 dimensional word vectors from GloVe ( with 840 billion pre-trained vectors ) to initialize the word embeddings , which we kept constant during training .

dropout.from sentence: We apply dropout between the layers with keep probability of 0.8 ( i.e dropout = 0.2 ) .

our model.from sentence: We trained our model with the AdaDelta ( Zeiler , 2012 ) optimizer for 50 epochs , an initial learning rate of 0.1 , and a minibatch size of 32 .
